column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The food was stellar. Some of the scrumptious plates we shared included the goat cheese baked in tomato sauce with garlic bread
column2: fried green peppers & course salt (YA'LL THESE WERE SO INEXPLICABLY GOOD)
column4: and mushroom, toast, aged roncal cheese & sherry gastrique. The food was truly delightful.
